description:
IOvisor vif driver fails with some network names because of schema usage in ifc_ctl

This will require changing plug_iovisor code [1] to not use network in the ifc_ctl event schema.

[1] https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/virt/libvirt/vif.py
title: IOvisor vif driver fails with some network names because of schema usage in ifc_ctl

comments.content:
IOvisor vif driver fails with some network names because schema usage in ifc_ctl

This will require changing plug_iovisor code [1] to not use network in the ifc_ctl event schema. 

[1] https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/virt/libvirt/vif.py
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~fawadkhaliq

comments.content:
@Fawad Khaliq:
Do you need assistance with your (unfortunately abandoned) patch [1]? It looks like only some unit tests where necessary.
Feel free to contact me (markus_z) in the IRC channel #openstack-nova and we can arrange something to make progress with this bug report.

References:
[1] https://review.openstack.org/259176
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller

comments.content: @makus_z thanks. The patchset and respective UTs are trivial. Just that I got busy with some other stuff so muawiakhan took over. Thanks for the help.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~fawadkhaliq

comments.content:

Branch:    master

commit 5dc7bcee56ca4d7cad9dfe16f879cabd23192521
Author: Muawia Khan <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Mar 30 14:43:34 2016 +0500

    Remove network information from IOVisor vif
    
    IOVisor vif driver fails with some network names
    because of schema usage in ifc_ctl, so this changeset
    removes the network name along to the ifc_ctl
    
    Change-Id: If91591acd95cd965ed2b8738136f2bd3d7bc4b0b
    Closes-Bug: #1527370
    Signed-off-by: Muawia Khan <email address hidden>
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
